subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: For Derek Jeter, the chase for 3,000 hits comes amid talk of his decline as a player, while Alex Rodriguez’s pursuit of the career home run record comes with an asterisk.
snippet: For Derek Jeter, the chase for 3,000 hits comes amid talk of his decline as a player, while Alex Rodriguez’s pursuit of the career home run record comes with an asterisk.
